meanings.definition: The highest point of a mountain.
meanings.sent1: From the mountaintop, you can see for miles.
meanings.sent2: We finally reached the mountaintop after a long hike.
meanings.sent3: The mountaintop seemed to touch the sky.
meanings.sent4: She felt on top of the world, like a mountaintop.
meanings.sent5: The snow-capped mountaintop gleamed in the sunlight.
